Name: wireguardctrl
Description: Package wireguardctrl enables control of WireGuard devices on multiple platforms. MIT Licensed.

Name: cryptonl
Description: Package cryptonl provides access to the Linux kernel crypto API's netlink interface. MIT Licensed.

Name: netlink
Description: Package netlink provides low-level access to Linux netlink sockets. MIT Licensed.

Name: vsock
Description: Package vsock provides access to Linux VM sockets (AF_VSOCK) for communication between a hypervisor and its virtual machines.  MIT Licensed.

Name: talks
Description: Talks by Matt Layher.  MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: quota
Description: Package quota provides access to Linux quota netlink notifications. MIT Licensed.

Name: genetlink
Description: Package genetlink implements generic netlink interactions and data types. MIT Licensed.

Name: devlink
Description: Package devlink provides access to Linux's devlink interface. MIT Licensed.

Name: mdlayher.com
Description: Matt Layher's personal static website. MIT Licensed.
